articles.title: Carrie Underwood Sings A Cappella At Donald Trump Inauguration After Tech Glitch – Watch - Deadline
articles.description: Carrie Underwood sung "America the Beautiful" during the inauguration of Donald Trump, performing a cappella after a tech glitch.
articles.content:
Carrie Underwood sung “America the Beautiful” during the inauguration of Donald Trump on Monday, performing it a cappella after a tech glitch over the piped-in music couldn’t be resolved.
